item.title: RAZR
item.description: Series: On-Going. A high school graduate decides it’s time to pursue his dreams of becoming a barber. Can he overcome his lack of confidence and take the steps necessary to run the best barbershop in the world?

item.title: Animl Farm: Epilogue
item.description: Written in 2018. Ever wondered what happened at the Animal Farm after the Pigs took control? Check out this epilogue!

item.title: The Navigators: Ignis Carcerem
item.description: Written in 2019. ÜberLife, The Conglomerate™ is at it again! Join Xandi and her Navigator, Torpe-Do, as they break Xandi’s father out of jail!

item.title: Tyotus Buckets: Aqua Bellum
item.description: Written in 2018. ÜberLife, The Conglomerate™ has determined it is time to start cleaning up the mess that is GNU City!

item.title: Progress? Happy New Year (In May)
item.description: Wow, I said monthly updates… and here I am, updating 5/6 months later. I need to be better with this.

item.title: New Year (2023), New Me
item.description: Last time I updated this was in February of 2022. Whew. So much life has happened…goals achieved, goals dropped…and here I am, back again, to tell you nothing about them haha.

item.title: Website Revamp
item.description: Welcome to Rid1Studios 2.0. I’ve decided that it’s time to take my creative work a little more seriously. I realized at the end of the year 2021, my skills have improved greatly from where I started in 2019.

item.title: Apple Watch
item.description: Apple Watch is a line of smartwatches produced by Apple Inc. It incorporates fitness tracking and health-oriented capabilities with integration with iOS and other Apple products and services.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Rid O1, a hobbyist cartoonist, and all around dabbler. I’m here to learn, create, and have fun. Thanks for checking out my small corner of the internet!
